Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

MetricReport.description: The metric definitions used to create a metric report.
MetricReport.longDescription: The value shall be reference to the definition for this metric report.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

MetricReportDefinition.description: The metric definitions used to create a metric report.
MetricReportDefinition.longDescription: The value shall be reference to the definition for this metric report.

MetricValues.description: An array of metric values for the metered items of this Metric.
MetricValues.longDescription: The values shall be metric values for this MetricReport.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

ReportSequence.description: The current sequence identifier for this metric report.
ReportSequence.longDescription: The value shall be the current sequence identifier for this metric report.

Timestamp.description: The time associated with the metric report in its entirety.  The time of the metric report may be relevant when the time of individual metrics are minimally different.
Timestamp.longDescription: The value shall be the time when the metric report was generated.

MetricValue.longDescription: A metric value in the context of a Metric.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MetricDefinition.description: A link to the Metric Definition.
MetricDefinition.longDescription: The value shall be reference to the Metric Definition resource that describes what this Metric Report is capturing.

MetricId.description: The metric definitions identifier for this metric.
MetricId.longDescription: The value shall be the same as the Id property of the source metric within the associated MetricDefinition.

MetricProperty.description: The URI for the property from which this metric is derived.
MetricProperty.longDescription: The value shall be URI to the a property following the JSON fragment notation, as defined by RFC6901, to identify an individual property in a Redfish resource.

MetricValue.longDescription: The value of the metric represented as a string.

Timestamp.description: The time when the value of the metric is obtained. A management application may establish a time series of metric data by retrieving the instances of metric value and sorting them according to their Timestamp.
Timestamp.longDescription: The value shall time when the metric value was obtained.  Note that this may be different from the time when this instance is created.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #MetricReport.v1_1_0.MetricReport
